import {useState}from 'react' import { Form, FloatingLabel, Container, Row, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Classess from "../../css/index.module.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Quran() { const [quran, setQuran] = useState({ book }); return ( <>
isActive ? `${Classess.deleteUpdateHover} ${Classess.deleteUpdateActive} px-4 border border-warning` : `${Classess.deleteUpdateHover} ${Classess.deleteUpdateUnActive} px-4 border border-info` } to="book" >
Edite And Delete
Quran
); }
